filmography.title: On the Waterfront
filmography.role_description: A convent-educated young woman who challenges a dockworker to stand up against the corrupt union mob that killed her brother.
filmography.plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

filmography.title: That Certain Feeling
filmography.role_description: A secretary who helps her ex-husband ghostwrite a comic strip while navigating a romantic farce.
filmography.plot: A neurotic artist is hired to ghostwrite a comic strip for a pompous cartoonist who is engaged to the artist's ex-wife.

filmography.title: A Hatful of Rain
filmography.role_description: The pregnant wife of a Korean War veteran who struggles to understand her husband's erratic behavior caused by a secret morphine addiction.
filmography.plot: A Korean War veteran's morphine addiction wreaks havoc on his family life.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Drama); BAFTA: Nomination – Best Foreign Actress

filmography.title: Raintree County
filmography.role_description: A gentle childhood sweetheart who waits for the protagonist while he is entangled with a mentally unstable Southern belle.
filmography.plot: An idealist teacher marries a beautiful but disturbed Southern belle during the American Civil War.

filmography.title: North by Northwest
filmography.role_description: A cool, sophisticated industrial designer who aids a fugitive on the run, though her true loyalties remain mysterious.
filmography.plot: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

filmography.title: Exodus
filmography.role_description: An American widow working as a nurse in Cyprus who becomes sympathetic to the Zionist cause and falls for an Israeli activist.
filmography.plot: The theme is the founding of the state of Israel. The action begins on a ship filled with Jewish immigrants bound for Israel.

filmography.title: All Fall Down
filmography.role_description: An older woman who falls in love with a charismatic but destructive drifter, leading to a tragic outcome.
filmography.plot: A young man idolizes his older, rebellious brother, but the arrival of a woman exposes the brother's true nature.

filmography.title: 36 Hours
filmography.role_description: A concentration camp survivor forced by the Nazis to pose as a nurse in an elaborate ruse to deceive an American officer.
filmography.plot: Germans try to get the D-Day invasion plans out of a captured American major by convincing him that the war is over.

filmography.title: The Sandpiper
filmography.role_description: The faithful wife of an Episcopal school headmaster who engages in an affair with a free-spirited artist.
filmography.plot: A free-spirited artist living in Big Sur begins an adulterous affair with the headmaster of the school her son attends.

filmography.title: The Russians Are Coming, the Russians Are Coming
filmography.role_description: A resident of a New England island who gets caught up in the panic when a Soviet submarine runs aground.
filmography.plot: Without hostile intent, a Soviet submarine runs aground off the coast of a New England island, causing panic among the islanders.

filmography.title: Grand Prix
filmography.role_description: A fashion magazine editor who engages in a romance with a Formula One driver during the racing season.
filmography.plot: American Grand Prix driver Pete Aron is fired by his team after a crash at Monaco that injures his British teammate.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Sound, Best Film Editing

filmography.title: The Stalking Moon
filmography.role_description: A white woman released from Apache captivity who seeks protection from a retiring army scout as a relentless warrior pursues them.
filmography.plot: A retiring army scout escorts a woman and her half-Indian son to safety while being stalked by the boy's father.

filmography.title: Loving
filmography.role_description: The long-suffering wife of a commercial artist who is struggling with fidelity and his career.
filmography.plot: A commercial artist tries to land a big account while his marriage crumbles.

filmography.title: Cancel My Reservation
filmography.role_description: The wife of a TV personality who helps him solve a murder mystery on a ranch in Arizona.
filmography.plot: A TV personality takes a vacation to a ranch in Arizona and gets involved in a murder mystery involving a land dispute.

filmography.title: A Christmas to Remember
filmography.role_description: An elderly farm woman who takes in her city-dwelling grandson for the holidays during the Depression.
filmography.plot: During the Great Depression, a city boy is sent to live with his grandparents on a Minnesota farm for Christmas.

filmography.title: The Best Little Girl in the World
filmography.role_description: The concerned mother of a teenage girl suffering from anorexia nervosa.
filmography.plot: A teenage girl suffering from anorexia nervosa struggles with her family's lack of understanding.

filmography.title: Splendor in the Grass
filmography.role_description: The repressive mother of the protagonist in this television remake of the 1961 classic.
filmography.plot: A remake of the 1961 film about two high school sweethearts in Kansas whose relationship is torn apart by family and social pressure.

filmography.title: Fatal Vision
filmography.role_description: The mother of a murdered woman who becomes convinced of her son-in-law's guilt in this true-crime miniseries.
filmography.plot: The true story of Jeffrey MacDonald, a Green Beret doctor who was convicted of murdering his wife and two daughters.

filmography.title: Nothing in Common
filmography.role_description: The quiet wife of a salesman who leaves him after 36 years of marriage, forcing her son to deal with the fallout.
filmography.plot: A successful advertising executive must care for his aging, difficult father after his mother leaves him.

filmography.title: The Last Days of Patton
filmography.role_description: The devoted wife of General George S. Patton, caring for him after his paralyzing car accident.
filmography.plot: The story of General George S. Patton's final days after a car accident leaves him paralyzed.

filmography.title: People Like Us
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite in a miniseries based on the Dominick Dunne novel, a role that earned her an Emmy.
filmography.plot: A writer navigates the secrets and scandals of New York high society.
filmography.awards: Emmy Award: Win – Outstanding Supporting Actress

filmography.title: I Dreamed of Africa
filmography.role_description: The mother of the protagonist who disapproves of her daughter's decision to move to Kenya.
filmography.plot: A woman moves to Africa with her husband and son, facing personal tragedy and the harsh realities of the continent.

filmography.title: Because of Winn-Dixie
filmography.role_description: An elderly librarian who befriends a young girl and shares stories of her past, including a bear encounter.
filmography.plot: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

filmography.title: Don't Come Knocking
filmography.role_description: The mother of an aging western movie star who flees the set to reconnect with his past.
filmography.plot: An aging movie star walks off the set of his latest film and travels across the West to find the child he never knew he had.

filmography.title: Superman Returns
filmography.role_description: The adoptive earthly mother of Superman, providing comfort and grounding to the superhero.
filmography.plot: Superman returns to Earth after a five-year absence and finds that things have changed while he was gone.

filmography.title: Winter's Tale
filmography.role_description: The elderly version of a character pivotal to the film's magical realism; Saint's final film performance.
filmography.plot: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.
